articles.author: Winnie Hsu
articles.title: Stocks Rise Across Asia on US-China Trade Truce: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: US and European stock futures fell in a sign investors are concerned higher tariffs will still exact some economic damage even after the US and China reached a trade truce.
articles.content:
US and European stock futures fell in a sign investors are concerned higher tariffs will still exact some economic damage even after the US and China reached a trade truce.
